Message.Title: None of this is true Flybaby
Message.Msg: "Masturbates247 is the latest Charlie fan who applauds his vitriol and death threats, nearly half a dozen of which have been posted in the last few days, his violent gay imagery and his posting of poster names. "I don't care what people say on this idiotic board" you might say, but you do. You are imitating Charlie, using his words, copying his names and overlooking the many excesses of what he writes while taking down EPMB for doing a scant portion of what Charlie does. Join the late Madbezos and Midnite as backers of a guy who has written his way into obsessive self-abusive misery. Like them you will deny supporting Charlie, but you are, every step of the way." None of this is true Flybaby.

Message.Title: Good Morning From Wonderful Philadelphia
Message.Msg: The exciting end of another school year! I see ebay is celebrating too by putting on the red. I'm putting on my blue suit and heading to church to thank God for another wonderful class of the best and the brightest who I know will never ever end up like our 13 year board troll John Sully Osborne z50com. Now, I get the whole summer to spend with my incredible extended family and garden. I hope that helps.

Message.Title: Why the valuation of Local Corp with lower than 40 million is one of the biggest jokes the Nasdaq had ever seen
Message.Msg: The Inflection Point of Local Corp is Now • Five material challenges in 24 months withstood »Significant cost to the company in revenue and earnings • Highest revenue per employee ever »Projected growth to about $900k per employee EOY »Running lean! • Returning to profit »Significant cost savings starting 1Q13 »Achieved 1Q13 Positive Adjusted EBITDA »Achieved positive cash from operations from 1Q13 Reuters: Local Corp Issues FY 2013 Guidance; Revenue Guidance In Line With Analysts' Estimates Local Corp Issues FY 2013 Guidance; Revenue Guidance In Line With Analysts' Estimates Thursday, 9 May 2013 04:15pm EDT Local Corp announced that for fiscal 2013, it expects revenue of between $93 million and $95 million and adjusted EBITDA to be at least $5 million. According to I/B/E/S Estimates, analysts are expecting the Company to report revenue of $95 million and EBITDA of $5.80 million for fiscal 2013.

Topic.Title: Good Morning! A Beautiful Spring Day From Fantastic Philadelphia

Message.Msg: "The end of the school year approaches!" Um, your post, to which I am replying, is dated "May 21". Above, you can clearly see that at that time, you are stating the school year is still very much in session, but winding down. Actually, the Spring session was over and the Summer session had already commenced at the time of your post! Yep, at Temple, final exams for the Spring 2013 session ended May 15 and Commencement was May 16. The Summer session began May 20. Where do you teach, "Professor"? Hope this helps
